T02D2804:163a-0: @163a * // thugs rje chen po gzi brjid 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2804:163a-1: sngags pa gang zhig lus ring nyam chung dang //
T02D2804:163a-2: bzhin bzang mthong bas 'gro ba dang 'gyur nyid //
T02D2804:163a-3: spro ba lhur len skye bo sdud byad pa //
T02D2804:163a-4: de dag phyir ni gzi brjid bskyed pa bri //
T02D2804:163a-5: gzi brjid 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2804:163a-6: ras ris la sogs mdun bzhugs la //
T02D2804:163a-7: brgya rtsa brgyad mtshan bstod pa yis //
T02D2804:163a-8: gus bstod me tog phreng ba gdags //
T02D2804:163a-9: gzhon nu ma brtul me long ngam //
T02D2804:163a-10: rin chen sogs 'od brdar ba yis //
T02D2804:163a-11: sku bkram me tog sbos sogs dbul //
T02D2804:163a-12: me yi las kyis dngos grub blang //
T02D2804:163a-13: sprin bral nyi ma zla ba dang //
T02D2804:163a-15: sku gzugs gsal bar byas nas su //
T02D2804:163a-16: hr'i: yig gzi brjid snying po bskyed //
T02D2804:163a-17: de la sku mchog bstims la sku //
T02D2804:163a-19: rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs gzi brjid bsdus //
T02D2804:163a-20: 'gro ba gzi brjid bskyed bdag don bsgrubs pas //
T02D2804:163a-21: phyi nang lus dang snying gi dbus //
T02D2804:163a-24: sdig 'joms rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T02D2804:163a-25: gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos //
T02D2804:163a-26: sangs rgyas sras po gzi bskyed la //
T02D2804:163a-27: gzi chen 'bar ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2804:163a-28: stobs bskyed bya phyir rtag tu dbul //
T02D2804:163a-29: sems can gzi byin chung du gang //
T02D2804:163a-30: de dag la yang cho ga bzhin //
T02D2804:163a-31: bzang dang 'gran zla ma rabs rim //
T02D2804:163a-32: dga' dang 'dun pa snying rjes spyod //
T02D2804:163a-33: lhag pa'i sems dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2804:163a-35: spro bas skye bo thams cad kyi //
T02D2804:163a-36: yid 'ong rlom pa zhu bar byed //
T02D2804:163a-37: mi gang 'jig rten mgon la dad //
T02D2804:163a-38: 'bar ba'i mtshan mas rtag lus mtshan //
T02D2804:163a-40: 'gro ba'i mig sngar lha ltar sdug /
T02D2804:163b-0: aom @163b a'a:hr'i:ma h'a dzny'a na sv'a h'a /
T02D2804:163b-1: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a k'a ru ni ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2804:163b-2: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a dzva la ga to sv'a h'a /
T02D2804:163b-4: nyi ma la sogs snang bar reg / rin chen sgron ma lag na thogs //
T02D2804:163b-5: 'di dag gzi brjid sgrub pa'i ltas //
T02D2804:163b-6: de nas blo ldan grong khyer sogs 'jug rang gi khyim du de brten la //
T02D2804:163b-7: 'od 'bar mdog bzangs mar me dri zhim bdug pa can skor snyan pa'i sgras //
T02D2804:163b-8: legs mchod su yang ji srid bdag song de srid mthong pa 'bab bkag la //
T02D2804:163b-9: slar log don bsgrub gtor mas mnyes bya slob ma bzang la rgyu mchod bsgoms //
